forest.description: You are in a dense forest. There are tall trees all around you and a faint path leading north.

mountain.description: You are at the base of a tall mountain. There is a rocky path that leads up to the summit.

summit.description: You are at the summit of the mountain. The view is breathtaking and you can see for miles in all directions.

village.description: You are in a small village. There are a few houses and a well in the center of the village.
